snippet: The N.F.L.’s new regulation has some skill-position players concerned that such pads will slow them down.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s new regulation has some skill-position players concerned that such pads will slow them down.

headline.main: Rule Requiring Knee and Thigh Pads Worries Some Players
headline.print_headline: Rule Requiring Knee and Thigh Pads Worries Some Players
